backend/main.mo: Defines the Ribbit canister with storage, access control, ponds, posts, ribbits, users, likes, tags, and activity tracking types and state.
feature_evidence.json: Lists implemented frontend feature changes with associated files, components, tests, and confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of key frontend files describing layout, pages, components, and UI behaviors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting up the root div and loading the main React script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes and wraps the app with ThemeProvider and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/BookmarkButton.t: Bookmark toggle button component using useBookmarks to add or remove a lily bookmark.
frontend/src/components/CommentItem.tsx: Empty placeholder file with no implemented component.
frontend/src/components/EmojiReactions.t: Empty placeholder file with no implemented component.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer with navigation links and attribution including a heart icon and caffeine.ai link.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Responsive header with search UI, mobile menu, user avatar, and create menu, handling search term recording and navigation.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: App layout wrapping pages with Header, Footer, and a mobile left sidebar drawer that closes on route changes.
frontend/src/components/LeftSidebar.tsx: Renders the main navigation sidebar with active-route highlighting and recent activity list. Fetches lily data for activities and supports mobile drawer mode.
frontend/src/components/LilyCard.tsx: Displays a lily post with avatar, metadata, image handling, and actions like like, share, and bookmark. Fetches counts and user/pond info dynamically.
frontend/src/components/MobileLeftSideba: Mobile drawer wrapper for the LeftSidebar with body scroll lock and animated overlay. Opens and closes via props.
frontend/src/components/PondAboutSidebar: Shows detailed pond info including stats, moderators, join/leave actions, and visibility. Loads pond data and user profiles with skeleton states.
frontend/src/components/PondMobileHeader: Mobile header for pond pages showing banner, profile image, description, and tab navigation. Supports switching between feed and about tabs.
frontend/src/components/RibbitItem.tsx: Renders a ribbit (comment) with nested depth, likes, replies, and user avatar. Supports posting replies and liking/unliking ribbits.
frontend/src/components/RightSidebar.tsx: Displays trending ponds, popular tags, and recent popular posts using query data with loading states and memoized calculations.
frontend/src/components/search/MobileSea: Mobile full‑screen search modal showing trending searches or suggestions based on query with selection handlers.
frontend/src/components/search/SearchDro: Dropdown search panel showing trending terms or suggestions depending on query input.
frontend/src/components/TagHubRightSideb: Shows top, trending, and newest tags with shared tag stat modules and loading handling.
frontend/src/components/UnderlineTabs.ts: Provides styled wrappers for tab lists and triggers using custom underline classes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refetching dependent queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useBookmarks.ts: Manages bookmarked lily IDs with localStorage persistence and helper functions for modification.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebounce.ts: Debounces a value with a configurable delay using a timeout.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identities, and auth client setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useMediaQuery.ts: Tracks whether a given media query matches using window.matchMedia.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating pond, user, and membership data through the actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, theme variables, dark mode tokens, and custom utility classes for UI elements.
frontend/src/lib/formatNumber.ts: Formats large numbers into short notations like k, M, and B with one-decimal rounding.
frontend/src/lib/pondNameValidation.ts: Validates, normalizes, and returns error messages for pond names restricted to alphanumeric characters.
frontend/src/lib/shareLily.ts: Implements lily sharing via Web Share API with clipboard and textarea fallbacks plus toast notifications.
frontend/src/lib/tagValidation.ts: Validates, normalizes, and provides error messages for alphanumeric-only tags.
frontend/src/lib/user.ts: Manages user identity, Froggy Phrase handling, and settings backup via localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/viewCountCooldown.ts: Implements per-lily cooldown tracking for view count increments using timestamps in localStorage.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with platform description, features, and community guidelines.
frontend/src/pages/AllPondsPage.tsx: Displays all ponds with loading states, membership badges, and links to start or view ponds.
frontend/src/pages/CreateLilyPage.tsx: Form page for creating lilies with support for text, image, link types, tag suggestions, validation, and pond selection.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePondPage.tsx: Form for creating a new pond with name validation, images, description, and froggy phrase checks.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePostPage.tsx: Empty placeholder file for a create‑post page.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the main feed of lilies with trending/new sorting, search handling, and sidebars.
frontend/src/pages/LilyPage.tsx: Displays a single lily with comments, likes, view tracking, and lightbox image handling.
frontend/src/pages/PondAboutPage.tsx: Shows pond details, moderators, metadata, and allows leaving the pond with loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/PondPage.tsx: Loads pond info, lists lilies filtered by pond name, and handles joining ponds with loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/PostPage.tsx: Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/SavedLiliesPage.tsx: Displays locally bookmarked lilies, loading states, and allows removing bookmarks.
frontend/src/pages/TagHubPage.tsx: Shows top, trending, and newest tags with loading states and navigation to individual tag pages.
frontend/src/pages/TagPage.tsx: Displays lilies for a specific tag with canonical tag redirection and sorting options.
frontend/src/pages/UserSettingsPage.tsx: Provides UI for managing username, profile, avatar, joined ponds, and admin tag tools with multiple queries and mutations.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, listing UI spacing fix requirements and pending feature requests for multiple pages. Contains existing features, new requests, and metadata like versions and project name.
